snippet: GARRETT--Elizabeth. We at NewYork-Presbyterian mourn the loss of our dear friend and colleague Elizabeth Garrett. As president of Cornell University, she was an inspirational and visionary leader, dedicated to advancing innovation and excellence in every area of academia. Her extraordinary intellect, integrity and insight will have a lasting impact on everyone who met her. We offer our condolences to her husband, Professor Andrei Marmor, her family and loved ones and the entire Cornell University community. Frank A. Bennack, Jr., Chairman of the Board of Trustees Steven J. Corwin, M.D., President and CEO NewYork-Presbyterian 1/3
